column1: Lenovo 400 Wireless Mouse, 1200DPI Optical Sensor, 2.4GHz Wireless Nano USB, 3-Button

The Lenovo 400 Wireless Mouse meets our rigorous test standards and is a sure bet, with a battery life of up to 12 months and left/right buttons that last up to 8 million clicks
